features: The flash drive for USB Type C devices
Easily transfer files between smartphones, tablets and computers
Free up space on your Android smartphone (mobile device requires USB Type C port and on the go (OTG) support)
Retractable design with a reversible USB Type C connector and a traditional USB connector

High speed USB 3.1 performance of up to 150MB/s read speeds (USB Type C port with USB 3.1, Gen. 1/USB 3.0 support required; Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending upon host device)
body.description: Easily free up space on your smartphone or quickly transfer files between devices at USB 3.1 high speeds of up to 150MB/s(1). With a reversible USB Type-C connector and a traditional USB connector, the SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C lets you quickly and easily transfer files between smartphones, tablets and computers. Plus the SanDisk Memory Zone app for Android (available on Google Play)(3) helps you manage your device’s memory and your content. The SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C is the perfect liaison between your new USB Type-C device and your devices with traditional USB ports. | *1GB = 1,000,000,000 bytes. Actual user storage less. | (1) 32GB-256GB: Read speeds up to 150MB/s. 16GB: Read speeds up to 130MB/s. Write speeds lower and vary by capacity. USB Type-C port with USB 3.1, Gen. 1/USB 3.0 support required. Based on internal testing; performance may be lower depending upon host device. 1MB=1,000,000 bytes. | (2) Mobile device requires USB Type-C port and On-The-Go (OTG) support | (3) Download and installation required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C Easily free up space on your smartphone (1) or quickly transfer files between devices at USB 3.1 high speeds of up to 150MB/s (2). With a reversible USB Type-C connector and a traditional USB connector, the SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C lets you quickly and easily transfer files between smartphones, tablets and computers. The SanDisk Memory Zone app for Android (available on Google Play) (3) helps you manage your device’s memory and your content. SanDisk products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SanDisk product. What's in the Box? SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C At a Glance: Easy transfer between smartphones, tablets (1) and PC and Mac computers Free up space on your Android smartphone (1) USB Type-C connector and a traditional USB connector High-speed USB 3.1 performance of up to 150MB/s (2) SanDisk Memory Zone file management app for easy back up (3)

Compatible with USB Type-C Devices The SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C Flash Drive is designed specifically for next-generation devices with the new USB Type-C port. The reversible connector has a symmetric design that is always right-side up, making it easy to plug in. High-Speed USB 3.1 Performance With high-speed USB 3.1 performance of up to 150MB/s (2), the Ultra Dual Drive lets you quickly and easily transfer photos, videos, songs, and other files between devices. Dual USB Type-C and Type-A Connectors With dual USB connectors, the Ultra Dual Drive is compatible with both the new USB Type-C ports and the traditional USB Type-A ports. Use it to free up space on your smartphone or tablet (1) or transfer files between multiple devices.

SanDisk Memory Zone App for Easy File Management Available from the Google Play store, the SanDisk Memory Zone app (3) lets you view, access, and back up all the files from your phone's memory in one location. It can also automatically move files from your device to your drive to free up space. Compatible with USB 3.0 and 2.0 Ports The SanDisk Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C Flash Drive is backward-compatible with USB 2.0, so you can plug it into any USB 3.0 or 2.0 port. Choose the Amount of Storage You Need The amount of capacity you need depends on the types and number of files you have and their size. The chart above gives you an idea of how many photos, videos, and music and other files you can store for each capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, dual capable, and huge. Love it!
reviews.reviewText: The SanDisk 128GB Ultra Dual Drive is a great way to add extra storage to your smartphone or tablet. It has a reversible USB Type-C connector on one end and a traditional USB connector on the other, so you can use it with both your mobile devices and your computer.The Ultra Dual Drive is also very fast. It has a read speed of up to 150MB/s, so you can quickly transfer files between your devices. It also has a write speed of up to 120MB/s, so you can backup your photos and videos quickly and easily.The Ultra Dual Drive is also very durable. It is made from a durable metal casing that can withstand knocks and drops. It is also water-resistant and dust-proof, so you don't have to worry about damaging it if you take it with you on the go.Overall, the SanDisk 128GB Ultra Dual Drive is a great choice for anyone looking for a portable, fast, and durable way to add extra storage to their mobile devices.Here are some of the pros and cons of the SanDisk 128GB Ultra Dual Drive:Pros: Reversible USB Type-C connector Fast transfer speeds Durable metal casing Water-resistant and dust-proofCons: Slightly more expensive than some other flash drivesOverall, the SanDisk 128GB Ultra Dual Drive is an excellent flash drive that offers a great combination of features and performance. It is a great choice for anyone looking for a portable, fast, and durable way to add extra storage to their mobile devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty storage solution!
reviews.reviewText: The SanDisk 64GB Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C is a small but mighty storage solution that has greatly simplified my digital life.This USB drive's dual compatibility with USB-C and USB 3.1 ensures that I can effortlessly transfer files between my modern devices and older ones. It's incredibly versatile, and the 64GB capacity offers ample space for storing documents, photos, videos, and more.What sets this drive apart is its compact and durable design. The swivel mechanism protects the connectors when not in use, preventing damage or dirt accumulation. Its sleek and stylish look makes it a sleek addition to my tech accessories.Transferring files is lightning-fast thanks to USB 3.1, and the reliability of SanDisk ensures that my data is safe and secure. Whether I'm backing up important files or sharing content between devices, this USB drive has proven itself to be a reliable companion.The SanDisk 64GB Ultra Dual Drive USB Type-C is a versatile and efficient storage solution that simplifies data transfer between various devices. Its compact design, ample storage capacity, and lightning-fast speed make it an excellent addition to anyone's tech toolkit. Highly recommended for those seeking a reliable and convenient storage solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was not expecting it to be soooooo small!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my new MacBook to facilitate the seamless transfer and storage of files across my various computers, and I must say, it performs flawlessly. The USB-C and USB connections work seamlessly on all my devices, delivering impressive transfer speeds. What truly sets it apart is the effortless transition between USB-C and USB – it's as simple as flipping a switch.While its compact size is a significant advantage, it's also a bit daunting. To ease my concerns about potential loss, I attached a bright lanyard to it for peace of mind. Despite this minor precaution, I absolutely adore this drive. If you own a MacBook with solely USB-C ports, this is a must-have accessory that complements the computer perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars MOST CONVENIENT, BEST VALUE/GB, TRASH WRITE SPEEDS, WORTH
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent storage solution on the go, and as someone with enough USB Type C and Type A devices, the convenience is a godsend that can't be matched by cables. Moreover, the SanDisk Memory Zone app is simple and works well, which surprised me because in the past I've thought SanDisk utilities were little help and annoying to use. I liked it so much and it was simple enough to use that I got one for my dad to use with his Android phone and laptop. I paid $22 for 128 GB, which is a good storage deal in 2019 IF all the specs listed are met...HOWEVER this is where I'm sorely disappointed. The read speeds are near advertised and acceptable, but the write speeds are far slower at about less than a third of what's advertised. Moreover, the drive gets concerningly hot, particularly when it is being used in Type C mode. However, both read and write speeds are a touch faster in Type C mode as well and makes me call into question the buses used to interface with the memory, if the drive really is USB 3.1. When I plug it into my computer, the disk label reads 3.0, so I'm not sure whether they marketed the information or labeled it incorrectly. Moreover, there was a rumour that this drive is actually a micro SD card slotted into a dual adapter they've rigged up, which I could believe due to the sad write performance of the drive. Not in the mood to crack it open and break it to find out, but I definitely will once it fails.SanDisk has a reputation and it kinda makes me sad to see a product miss the advertised marks this badly. As someone in tech, I keep an eye on the specs and rely on them to be true to the device which is why it frustrates me so much when a legitimate company makes mistakes and flat out lies like this. It makes me not want to give them money.So why did I rate it 4 stars?Because I'll be damned if this isn't the best flash drive I've owned, lies and all. I've been waiting for this type of drive for a while and most reputed companies haven't put one of them out yet, probably because the technology isn't good enough to have consistent enough quality in speed, which apparently SanDisk isn't bothered with ;) The convenience and the huge amount of storage for $20 on a drive that will actually work on all of my devices at a decent pace is too much of an allure to pass up. As long as the file isn't too big and I use this as a casual, day to day drive as most people will, this will work well enough. Moreover, the app is so dead simple and convenient for even the tech illiterate to use. May still want to attach to a cable for those 4K videos though.Speeds in my pictures were collected using CrystalDiskMark. Faster speeds collected through USB-C Thunderbolt interface on same machine as the USB-A test, run on 3.1.
Using it for car recording in my Tesla. Fast processing and playback.
Muito útil as conexões tipo USB (computadores, notebooks) e USB-C (celulares, tablet). Velocidade rápida. 128 GB de espaço para dados. Tamanho físico pequeno, não ocupa espaço. Ótimo custo/benefício.
Um pendrive excelente. Quebra um galho quando tenho q acessar arquivos outransferir pelo telefone. Top
Pen drive de qualidade. Chegou rápido e em perfeitas condições
Me encantó, es muy práctico y portátil.
